name: Cumulus Jacket Yellow
name_cn: 积云 夹克 黄色
description:
Temp. Rating: -35 / 10 °C
Carrying Capacity: 5K µSCU
Be bold and brave the cold in frigid conditions up to -35 °C with the Cumulus's special thermal lining. An oversized, insulated hood provides additional protection around the head, while the distinct quilted torso stops snow, ice, and wind from seeping in, ensuring the wearer remains warm and dry.
description_cn:
储物空间：5K μSCU
适用温度：-35 / 10 °C
借助"积云"的特殊的保暖内衬，勇敢面对低至-35 °C的严寒吧。超大的隔热风帽在头部周围提供额外防护，独特的绗缝外衣可以防止雪，冰和风渗入，确保穿着者保持温暖和干燥。
